article.title: Northrop Awarded $100 Million to Support Mission Command Training Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Technical Services Incorporated, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a $100,545,899 firm-fixed-price contract for the support services for the Mission Command Training Center, Fort Hood, Texas, and its supported installations.Â The U.S. Army Mission and Installation Command, Fort Hood, Texas, is the contracting activity.
